roles.title: Senior iOS Developer
duties: Develop and maintain native iOS applications serving millions of users across Latin America
Implement scalable MVVM and Clean Architecture patterns in large-scale projects
Integrate with REST APIs and GraphQL services for delivery and fintech solutions
Optimize app performance and user experience for mission-critical applications
Lead technical mentoring and code reviews for junior developers
Implement CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks
Collaborate cross-functionally with product, design, and backend teams

projects.name: Personal Website - Vapor Swift
projects.description: This personal website built entirely with Vapor Swift featuring automated static site generation, internationalization, dark/light themes, and full CI/CD pipeline.

resume_string: Senior iOS Developer with 6+ years of experience building high-impact mobile applications for millions of users. Specialized in Swift, SwiftUI, and scalable architectures. Expert in full-stack development with Vapor Swift, React, and modern cloud technologies. Passionate about code quality, best practices, and technical mentoring.
